definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Welsh origin, derived from the name Ioan, which is the Welsh form of John. It is commonly used in English-speaking countries and carries the meaning 'God is gracious'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自威尔士语的男性名字，由 Ioan 演变而来，是 John 的威尔士形式，意为‘上帝是仁慈的’，在英语国家中广泛使用。
definitions.example_en: Evan is a talented musician who performs in local jazz clubs.
definitions.example_cn: 伊万是一位才华横溢的音乐家，常在本地爵士俱乐部演出。
